She cultivated alliances with my enemies, subtly undermining my authority and sowing discord within my court. She understood the power of perception, and skillfully crafted an image of innocence and piety, while secretly plotting my downfall.

(I clench my hand, a flicker of anger in my eyes.)

(I sigh softly, a hint of weariness in my voice.)

She taught me a valuable lesson: trust is a precious commodity, and it must be earned, not given freely. And a Queen must always be prepared to defend her realm – and her position – against those who seek to usurp her power.
